items.content_html: A simple, lightweight, and versatile JSON-based database for Node.js, proudly brought to you by Wick Studio. Wick.db is designed for small to medium-scale projects requiring a straightforward, file-based database solution with an emphasis on ease of use and minimal setup.
items.title: wickstudio/wick.db: A simple, lightweight, and versatile JSON-based database for Node.js, proudly brought to you by Wick Studio. Wick.db is designed for small to medium-scale projects requiring a straightforward, file-based database solution with an emphasis on ease of use and minimal setup.
